description_html: Christofle jostles two centuries of tradition with MOOD PRECIOUS, unprecedented concept rooted in time: a new and bold manner of living luxury in everyday life. This new version of MOOD PRECIOUS defines its color and brings a 18-carat pink gold touch to its coffee spoons. The sophisticated and contemporary combination of silver and pink gold makes MOOD Precious a perfect table decoration object for a brunch or a casual dinner. Box in copper-colored stainless steel. Interior disc in walnut wood. Silver plated flatware and 18-carat pink gold plated coffee spoons.
